text: Bronius Kuzmickas (10 November 1935 – 6 November 2023)Mirė signataras Bronislavas Kuzmickas was a Lithuanian politician and philosopher. In 1990, he was one of the signers of the Act of the Re-Establishment of the State of Lithuania. He was born in Šilavotas, Lithuania and educated in Kaunas. Then he went to Vilnius University and the Institute of Philosophy of the Academy of Sciences of the USSR in Moscow. From 1966 he taught philosophy, mostly in the Lithuanian Cultural Research Institute. Then he taught philosophy at Klaipėda University From 1990 to 1992 and 1996-2000 he was a member of the Seimas. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Members of the Seimas Category:Philosophers
title: Bronius Kuzmickas
